name: Yukki-Music Old
description: Telegram Bot for streaming music trough the Telegram Group video chat feature.

SESSION_NAME.description: fill with the pyrogram session string

OWNER_ID.description: fill with your telegram id as the owner of the bot

ASS_ID.description: fill with the telegram id of account you used for the assistant/userbot

LOG_GROUP_ID.description: create a private group and get the group id and fill the group id here, Then add the assistant and bot as admin to the group

SUDO_USERS.description: fill with the id of user who can access the sudo feature in your bot (for multiple IDs separate with space)

BOT_TOKEN.description: fill with your bot token get from @BotFather on telegram

MONGO_DB_URI.description: fill with the mongodb url (this is needed for the database). Get it from mongodb.cloud.com
